entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable TRACE_GC validation build once the build has been fixed #108628
  • ILAsm should generate assemblies that are valid for binskim #108627
  • adding a GetExpirationTime(Time-to-Live) method to the IMemoryCache #108626
  • Streaming response bodies from an HttpClient in UWP in debug builds will hang on large messages. #108622
  • `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` doesn't work with open instance delegates over methods on a generic type in CoreCLR #108619
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: Failed on .NET MAUI CI for macOS build: Fatal error in IL Linker #108617
    9.0.0
  • StackAlongDimension does not return correct result #108615
  • win/x64: Assertion failed 'false && "found use of a node that is not in the LIR sequence"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #108613
    9.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Assertion prop' #108612
    9.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' during 'Emit code' #108611
    10.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'genExactlyOneBit(availableSet)' during 'Generate code' #108609
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'bbNumTryLast <= bbNumOuterTryLast' during 'Optimize layout' #108608
    9.0.0
  • SslStreamCertificateContext.Create can fail on Windows when calling process does not have rights to certificate store #108607
    10.0.0
  • Enable arcade -sign functionality in runtime #108605
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!op2->isUsedFromReg() || (op2->GetRegNum() != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #108601
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #108600
    9.0.0
  • More frequent timeout on outbound request after upgrading to .net 8 #108599
  • ARM64-AdvSimd: incorrect LoadVector128 summary #108594
  • .NET 9 assert failure #108589
  • HttpClient does not automatically follow https to http redirects #108588
    Future
  • Cannot build Native AOT for win32 on linux #108587
    Future

Closed

  • AV in clr in CI during `CEEInfo::getArgType` call #108586
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetRemainingLifetime Method to IMemoryCache Interface for Retrieving Cache Entry Expiration Time #108621
  • `dotnet --info` returns an incorrect value for x86 SDK with Non Native Host #108502
  • Port System.ComponentModel docs for .NET 9 APIs #105983
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Need a Reliable Way to Check to See if a Type is a Record Class #108531
  • [Source Generator] Source Generator works with dotnet cli but fails with `TypeLoadException` in VS #108164
  • [mono] Fix swift lowering for InlineArray when static field occurs before instance field #108522
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify handling of RMW intrinsics in LSRA #104842
    10.0.0
  • Process.GetProcessById() doesn`t load StartInfo property #108591
  • Bug in IndexOf with InvariantCultureIgnoreCase in .NET 5 and above? #108424
    9.0.0
  • KeyPerFile Configuration provider does not reload configuration when K8S config maps mapped to volumes changes #91640
    Future
  • ILC compiler failure with SynchronizationLockException in CI #108590
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253.cmd #107891
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884.cmd #107892
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108360
    10.0.0
  • Project created with dotnet new wasmbrowser ignores the launchSettings.json in Visual Studio #108585
    9.0.0
  • Starting many threaded processes breaks asynchronous read operations when using WaitForExit(int) #108395
    Future
  • window.Module.FS.filesystems does not have IDBFS anymore in dotnet >8.0.3 #108580
  • Static readonly list not being enumerated in second foreach #108189

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `IsNetBSD` to `OperatingSystem` #108630
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #108624
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Remove `uint` casts in `string.{Try}CopyTo` #108614
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unblock cloning of loops where the header is a try begin #108604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow SCEV analysis of non-values #108603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileBase in cDAC #108602
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][debugging][release/9.0] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][debugging] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108583
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] stop testing with nodejs #108582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't call HasCustomModifier when the argument type is something normalized to ELEMENT_TYPE_PTR or ELEMENT_TYPE_BYREF #108610
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move more helpers from DomainAssembly to Assembly #108568
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Small refactoring on ps script for Stress Tests #108596
    area-System.Net
  • Fix getting default install location for x64 when running x86 host on x64 Windows #108538
    area-Host
  • [mono] [Swift interop] Fix InlineArray lowering with static fields #108546
    os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108548
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108563
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Enable range-based for over ABI passing segments #107174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Use the managed codec for basic constraints and remove entire X.509 extension PAL #108578
    area-System.Security
  • Debugger should not manage exceptions during shutdown #105270
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize Memmove unrolling for constant src #108576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Revert distribute_free_regions changes in preparation for different strategy #108417
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • guard agains empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Investigate SwiftSelf<T> CI error #108554
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Interop-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108543
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2554122 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix macOS arm64 Unix breakpoint #108560
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Aspire dotnet-watch support: Properly handle launch profile specified in DCP #43946

Closed

  • `dotnet add package` does not report vulnerablities #43935
  • dotnet nuget package list -- error: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path') #43936
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' in .Net9-rc1 #43593

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • WebSDK: OneDeploy - use 'PLACEHOLDER' value for variable that represent a secret in Unit Tests #43943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't fire azdo PR pipelines for simple documentation changes #43940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43914
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43913
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the table for 9.0.2xx and 10.0.1xx #43918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove vstest 0001-Auto-property-suggestion.patch #43939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43933
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid serializing/deserializing manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for Aspire #43884
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2554641 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make a parallel loop for define static web assets #43743
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0004 false positive when using GetType() #75424
  • Wrong binder used in `SwitchExpressionBinder` logic #75416
    17.13
  • Assert fails in NullableWalker with (invalid) statement block in assignment #75412
    Backlog

Closed

  • No suggestions in switch expression arm when dotting on an enum type in a `Color Color` case #75350
    Backlog
  • Bring back MetadataReference.CreateFromAssembly #75409
  • Compiler should error when it hits native PDB writer limits #75237
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Escape the line #75425
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Report obsolete DisposeAsync method in await foreach #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have find references navigate to a position instead of a span #75418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix updating solution fallback options #75417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add span conversions to the compiler test plan #75415
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Handle span conversions in `is` operator #75413
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Merged

  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75420
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove !! parsing logic from the parser #75394
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75397
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75395
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode, Next
  • Fix suggestions for dotted constant patterns in Color Color case #75373
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update instructions for adding new `ErrorCode.WRN_` #75386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in TypeSymbolExtensions.IsAtLeastAsVisibleAs #75401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix some more unnecessary NFW reporting #75403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge "first-class Span types" feature into main #74732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Added "propr" snippet for required properties #75339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent behavior for selecting output formatter based on Accept header with `ReturnHttpNotAcceptable = true` option set #58282
  • AddModelError does not work for expressions that ends with indexer. #58271
  • RedirectHandler doesn't copy content for PATCH requests #58270
  • SignalR JavaScript client sometimes freeze at Connecting or Disconnecting state unexpectedly #58260

Closed

  • blazor.server.js SyntaxError: Unexpected token '{' in Safari Version 16.3. with a Mac Studio using Ventura 13.2 #58212
  • signalr 8 / Angular: The package "url" wasn't found on the file system but is built into node #52082
    8.0.7
  • Bootstrap 5.3.3 upgrade breaks Blazor template styling #58214
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58226
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58261
  • Exception is raised in when setting interactivemode in blazor server authentication type enabled web app project #58222
  • [OutputCaching] `OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices` is always `null` during initialization #55805
    10.0-preview1
  • Using JS Interop in OnInitializedAsync() cannot initially find JS function #29215 #58174

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58280
    area-blazor, tell-mode
  • Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58279
    area-blazor
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58277
    area-blazor, ask-mode
  • Revert trimming test workarounds #58272
    area-infrastructure
  • fix: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing RedirectHandler HasBody doesn't work with PATCH #58269
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-mvc-testing

Merged

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys, update dependencies from Arcade #58278
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.11
  • [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58245
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rtm.24506.1 #58263
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Update the Microsoft.Identity.Web versions used by project templates #58229
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.11

Updated

  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add retry for test Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore.Test.ProtectedUserStoreTest.PhoneFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #58232

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnPlatform does not work in Header of CollectionView #25124
  • [UITest] Enable Stepper Control so that it can work with Appium on all platforms #25120
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Crash on Windows When Setting "IsClippedToBounds = true" in Custom Layout. #25118

Closed

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #25121

Merged

Updated

  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011

  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846

  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403

  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990

  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948

  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Paging with filter having a subentity collection #34847
  • [10.0] New translations and SQL optimization/simplification #34846
  • Script-Migration for SQL Server does not script transactions correctly #34841
  • Memory leak in .Net 8 using Entity Framework and Sqllite (.Net Maui Android) #34836
  • After upgrading from version 3.1.4 to 8.0.8, I can no longer lock using queries that use FromSqlInterpolated. #34835

Closed

  • Tags go missing when using final GroupBy #33794
    10.0.0
  • UseAzureSql is missing #34820
  • ExecuteDelete does not respect table mapping when also mapped to a view #34834

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.5 to 9.0.0 #34842
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • remove repeated IsGenericMethod and GetGenericMethodDefinition in SqlServerByteArrayMethodTranslator #34419
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 8.0.2 to 8.0.8 #34843
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.59.0 to 2.66.0 #34845
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.12.0 to 1.12.1 #34844
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix tags for final GroupBy queries #34787
  • [release/9.0] Don't throw on non-transactional migration operation warning. #34830
    Servicing-approved
  • Optimize DISTINCT over singleton collections #34702

Updated

  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
  • Enable `Resolve_scoped_application_service` test #34129
  • thoughts on caching argumentsPropagateNullability arrays? #34422
  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770
